amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1996 to close the "janitors insurance" tax loophole.

action.text: Amendment SA 662 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 662 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 63. Record Vote Number: 175.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 662.
Amendment SA 662 proposed by Senator Edwards. (consideration: CR S6441; text: CR S6441) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1996 to close the "janitors insurance" tax loophole.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 662 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 63. Record Vote Number: 175.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 662 proposed by Senator Edwards.
